Title: Seriously not recommended....Very disappointed....Don't buy !!!!
View1:
Built Quality :- Let's start from the built quality, Although the product looks premium in the advertisements, in reality, the plastic used is of VERY AVERAGE quality. JARS ARE ALL PLASTIC which was not expected at this price point...Average build was not expected from such a reputed brand.

Customer Service/ Support :- Upon receiving the product, I did not recieve even a single call for installation or demo etc. from the company/ brand although the other competing brands are providing proper installation and demonstration with their products. Spares and Service are available only in very limited states and service and spares are PRACTICALLY NON -EXISTENT IN NORTH INDIA. So, if you bought this mixer grinder in North India, and your product develops problems , You are literally doomed..!!

Durability :- Although we are a family of just 2, and cook only once in a day, and sometimes even use the mixer grinder just one or twice in a whole week., But, Within 6 months, the coupler came out and had to be replaced. But, since spare parts availability is such an issue in North India , I had to buy replacement coupler from third party.

Grinding :- 1.) Although motor is advertised to be heavy (750 watts), but the grinding quality is very AVERAGE. The grinding is NOT UNIFORM and even while grinding relatively softer items like biscuits or smoothies, we must expect LUMPS ....(Imagine my surprise, when It took me 3 cycles of grinding just to grind soft biscuits into a lump free mass...)
2.) Noise levels from the motor are very high and I would recommend to use some kind of ear protection if using the mixer grinder for prolonged duration.

Overall a very AVERAGE PERFORMANCE and therefore not worthy of its premium price tag.....
